======Check Ch1ckenscoop version.======

= Description =

[[asw_version.wiki|asw_version]] or [[asw_version.wiki|ver]] command to check Ch1ckenscoop version.

Enter one of these two commands [[asw_version.wiki|asw_version]] or [[asw_version.wiki|ver]] on server console or developer console.

Both commands available from r594 or 'Server version 2.0' or 'Rd Server version 1.0' or latest version.
